project.name: CloudKid Captions API
project.description: CloudKid Captions API: a library for playing captions with sound

Captions.name: Captions
Captions.description:
A class that creates captioning for multimedia content. Captions are
created from a dictionary of captions and can be played by alias. Captions 
is a singleton class and depends on `cloudkid.Audio` for the progress update.

params.name: captionDictionary
params.description: The dictionary of captions

params.name: field
params.description: An text field to use as the output for this captions object

classitems.description: Reference to the inherieted task
classitems.name: p

classitems.description: An object used as a dictionary with keys that should be the same as sound aliases
classitems.name: _captionDict

classitems.description:
A reference to the CreateJS Text object that Captions should be controlling. 
Only one text field can be controlled at a time.
When using PIXI textfields, textIsProp should be false.
classitems.name: _textField

classitems.description: The function to call when playback is complete.
classitems.name: _completeCallback

classitems.description: The collection of line objects {start:0, end:0, content:""}
classitems.name: _lines

classitems.description: The duration in milliseconds of the current sound.
classitems.name: _currentDuration

classitems.description: The current playback time
classitems.name: _currentTime

classitems.description: Save the current line index
classitems.name: _currentLine

classitems.description: Cache the last active line
classitems.name: _lastActiveLine

classitems.description: If we're playing
classitems.name: _playing

classitems.description: The singleton instance of Captions
classitems.name: _instance

classitems.description: If you want to mute the captions, doesn't remove the current caption
classitems.name: _muteAll

classitems.description:
If this Captions instance is a 'slave', that doesn't run cloudkid.Audio
and must have update() called manually (and passed milliseconds).
Default is false.
classitems.name: _isSlave

classitems.description:
If text should be set on the text field with '.text = ' instead of '.setText()'.
When using PIXI textfields, textIsProp should be false.
Default is true.
classitems.name: textIsProp

classitems.description:
An animation timeline from Animator or PixiAnimator. This is used for syncing captions to audio that is synced
with with an animation.
classitems.name: _animTimeline.

classitems.description: If this instance has been destroyed already
classitems.name: _isDestroyed

classitems.description: A bound update function to get the progress from Sound with
classitems.name: _boundUpdate

classitems.description: A bound completion callback for when Sound has finished playing.
classitems.name: _boundComplete

classitems.description: The version number of this library
classitems.name: VERSION

classitems.description: Creates the singleton instance of Captions, with an optional dictionary ready to go
classitems.name: init

params.name: captionDictionary
params.description: An object set up in dictionary format of caption objects.

params.name: field
params.description: An text field to use as the output for this captions object

classitems.description: The singleton instance of Captions
classitems.name: instance

classitems.description: Constructor for caption.
classitems.name: initialize

params.name: captionDictionary
params.description: An object set up in dictionary format of caption objects.

params.name: field
params.description: An text field to use as the output for this captions object. When using PIXI textfields, textIsProp should be false.

classitems.description: Mute all of the captions.
classitems.name: setMuteAll

params.name: muteAll
params.description: Whether to mute or unmute

classitems.description: If the captions are all currently muted.
classitems.name: getMuteAll

return.description: Whether the captions are all muted

classitems.description: Sets the dictionary object to use for captions. This overrides the current dictionary, if present.
classitems.name: setDictionary

params.name: dict
params.description: The dictionary object to use for captions.

classitems.description:
Sets the CreateJS Text or Pixi BitmapText/Text object that Captions should control the text of. 
Only one text field can be controlled at a time. When using PIXI textfields, textIsProp should be false.
classitems.name: setTextField

params.name: field
params.description: The CreateJS or PIXI Text object

classitems.description: Returns if there is a caption under that alias or not.
classitems.name: hasCaption

params.name: alias
params.description: The alias to check against

return.description: Whether the caption was found or not

classitems.description:
A utility function for getting the full text of a caption by alias
this can be useful for debugging purposes.
classitems.name: getFullCaption

params.name: alias
params.description: The alias to get the text of

params.name: [separator="
params.description: "] The separation between each line

return.description: The entire captions concatinated by the separator

classitems.description: Sets an array of line data as the current caption data to play.
classitems.name: _load

params.name: data
params.description: The string

classitems.description: Reset the captions
classitems.name: _reset

classitems.description:
Take the captions timecode and convert to milliseconds
format is in HH:MM:ss:mmm
classitems.name: _timeCodeToMilliseconds

params.name: input
params.description: The input string of the format

classitems.description: The playing status.
classitems.name: isPlaying

classitems.description: Calculate the total duration of the current caption
classitems.name: _getTotalDuration

classitems.description: Get the current duration of the current caption
classitems.name: currentDuration

classitems.description:
If this Captions instance is a 'slave', that doesn't run cloudkid.Audio
and must have update() called manually (and passed milliseconds).
classitems.name: isSlave

classitems.description: Start the caption playback. Captions will tell cloudkid.Audio to play the proper sound.
classitems.name: play

params.name: alias
params.description: The desired caption's alias

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to call when the caption is finished playing

return.description: The update function that should be called if captions isSlave is true

classitems.description:
Starts caption playback without controlling the sound or animation. Returns the update
function that should be called to control the Captions object.
classitems.deprecationMessage: Use play(alias) instead, isSlave should be set to true
classitems.name: run

params.name: alias
params.description: The caption/sound alias

return.description: The update function that should be called

classitems.description: Runs a caption synced to the audio of an animation.
classitems.deprecationMessage: Set Animator.captions or PixiAnimator.captions to set the captions object to use
classitems.name: runWithAnimation

params.name: animTimeline
params.description: The animation to sync to.

classitems.description:
Is called when cloudkid.Audio finishes playing. Is not called if 
a cloudkid.AudioAnimation finishes playing, as then stop() is called.
classitems.name: _onSoundComplete

classitems.description:
Convience function for stopping captions. Is also called by 
cloudkid.AudioAnimation when it is finished.
classitems.name: stop

classitems.description: Goto a specific time.
classitems.name: seek

params.name: time
params.description: The time in milliseconds to seek to in the captions

classitems.description: Callback for when a frame is entered, to sync to an animation's audio.
classitems.name: _updateToAnim

classitems.description: Callback for when a frame is entered.
classitems.name: _updatePercent

params.name: progress
params.description: The progress in the current sound as a percentage (0-1)

classitems.description:
Function to update the amount of time elapsed for the caption playback.
Call this to advance the caption by a given amount of time.
classitems.name: updateTime

params.name: progress
params.description: The time elapsed since the last frame in milliseconds

classitems.description: Calculates the captions after increasing the current time.
classitems.name: _calcUpdate

classitems.description: Updates the text in the managed text field.
classitems.name: _updateCaptions

classitems.description: Destroy this load task and don't use after this
classitems.name: destroy
